author: Krista Miller
title: One of the best new restaurants of 2015 is right here in Georgia
text:
A Georgia restaurant has been recognized as one of the best in the country. Savannah's The Grey was recognized by Esquire Magazine in their annual Best New Restaurants listing .
A profile on The Grey's chef Mashama Bailey describes her as having a 'fresh perspective' on southern cuisine, as she was raised in New York and spent summers in the South. However, that doesn't mean she won't cook foods traditionally labelled as 'soul food'. Her collards are ' fragrant with pecan smoke, camp out over low-burning embers and arrive with a sidecar of serrano pickling vinegar.'
This is not the first national press the Savannah restaurant has garnered. Food & Wine Magazine named it as one of the best restaurants in 2015 . The New York Times raved about chef Bailey in August, calling her cooking ' a succulent collision of tradition and autobiography'.
The Grey joins other Georgia restaurants Gunshow and The Optimist as entries on the annual Esquire list.
The full list for 2015's best new restaurants is:
Shaya , New Orleans
Townsman , Boston
The Progress , San Francisco
Muscadine , Portland, OR
The Grey , Savannah
Jockey Hollow Bar & Kitchen , Morristown, N.J.
B.S. Taqueria and Broken Spanish , Los Angeles
Momotaro , Chicago
Dolo Restaurant and Bar , Chicago
The Duck Inn , Chicago
Little Park , New York
Shuko , New York
Santina , New York
Mountain Bird , New York
